rules_text:
{G}{U}, {T}: This turn, each creature you control enters the battlefield with an additional +1/+1 counter on it.
{4}{G}{U}, {T}: Bifurcate target creature you control. Activate only as a sorcery. [i](If it isn’t a token, sacrifice it. If you do, create two tapped tokens that are copies of it except each is a Mutant.)[/i]
